scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development SERVER_TYPE=rest STOP_REDIRECT=true vue-cli-service serve --open
scripts.dev:stop-redirect: cross-env NODE_ENV=development SERVER_TYPE=rest STOP_REDIRECT=true vue-cli-service serve --open
scripts.dev:devTeam: cross-env NODE_ENV=development SERVER_TYPE=rest STOP_REDIRECT=true IS_DEV_TEAM=true vue-cli-service serve --open
scripts.dev:devTeam:lg: cross-env NODE_ENV=development SERVER_TYPE=rest STOP_REDIRECT=true IS_DEV_TEAM=true IS_LG=true vue-cli-service serve --open
scripts.dev:lg: cross-env NODE_ENV=development SERVER_TYPE=rest STOP_REDIRECT=true IS_LG=true vue-cli-service serve --open
scripts.demo:stop-redirect: cross-env NODE_ENV=development SERVER_TYPE=demo STOP_REDIRECT=true vue-cli-service serve --open
scripts.build:dev: cross-env SERVER_TYPE=rest STOP_REDIRECT=true vue-cli-service build --mode development
scripts.build:devTeam: cross-env SERVER_TYPE=rest STOP_REDIRECT=true IS_DEV_TEAM=true vue-cli-service build --mode development
scripts.build:devTeam:lg: cross-env SERVER_TYPE=rest STOP_REDIRECT=true IS_DEV_TEAM=true IS_LG=true vue-cli-service build --mode development
scripts.deploy:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development SERVER_TYPE=rest STOP_REDIRECT=true vue-cli-service build && node ./script/s3Uploader.dev.js
scripts.deploy:devTeam: cross-env NODE_ENV=development SERVER_TYPE=rest STOP_REDIRECT=true IS_DEV_TEAM=true vue-cli-service build && node  ./script/s3Uploader.dev.team.js
scripts.deploy:lg:devTeam: cross-env NODE_ENV=development SERVER_TYPE=rest STOP_REDIRECT=true IS_LG=true vue-cli-service build && node  script/s3Uploader.lg.dev.js
scripts.deploy:lg: cross-env NODE_ENV=development SERVER_TYPE=rest STOP_REDIRECT=true IS_LG=true vue-cli-service build && node  script/s3Uploader.lg.js
scripts.deploy:dev:demo: cross-env NODE_ENV=development SERVER_TYPE=demo STOP_REDIRECT=true vue-cli-service build && node ./script/s3Uploader.dev.js
